select mal_seq.nextval from dual
insert into myapprovalline values(#{malNo},#{empNo},#{malName},#{malFull})
mapper.select: select distinct(mal_name) from myapprovalline where emp_no=#{empNo}
select count(*) from myapprovalline where mal_name=#{malName} and emp_no=#{empNo}
select a.mal_full as malFull,d.dept_name as deptName from myapprovalline a join emp b on a.emp_no=b.emp_no join dept d on b.dept_no=d.dept_no where a.mal_name=#{malName} and a.emp_no=#{empNo}
